item.title: Unique guest experiences offered by the Peninsula Academy
item.description:
The Peninsula Hotels recently announced their Peninsula Academy Summer programs for this year. The luxury hotel group offers exclusive experiences focused on food, fashion, and art, perfect for corporate events or special clients. Source: Peninsula Hotels. Each program includes unique touches like bespoke Peninsula transportation, ranging from private helicopters and chauffeured Rolls-Royces to MINI Cooper S Clubman vehicles. Here are some highlights from their Asian properties: The Peninsula Hong Kong presents “Caviar Connoisseurship,” providing an in-depth look into the world of sustainably-farmed caviars, exploring their distinct qualities and ideal enjoyment methods...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/unique-guest-experiences-offered-by-the-peninsula-academy/
